title: CVAT images validator
body: CVAT-image-validator is a tool that helps to check all the editions made in [CVAT](https://github.com/opencv/cvat) and makes easy to validate in order to pass a good quality of data for Machine Learning model training.

title: Kenya GHG Emissions Dashboard
body: Greenhouse stats measurements for the government of Kenya.

title: Relabeler
body:
Web application for Machine Learning training data creation using Satellite images.

The first input data come from [label-maker](https://github.com/developmentseed/label-maker); Relabeler helps to clean up the data and them to pass it for Machine Learning model training.

title: Special Economic Zones Viewer
body: A special economic zone (SEZ) is an area in which the business and trade laws are different from the rest of the country. SEZs are located within a country's national borders, and their aims include increased trade balance, employment, increased investment, job creation and effective administration.

title: OSM-SEED
body: A collection of Dockerfiles to run a containerized version of OpenStreetMap

title: Hacking INEI data
body: Bunch of scripts to obtain geo data from [atlas.inei.gob.pe/inei](http://atlas.inei.gob.pe/inei),  [Outputs](https://github.com/Rub21/get-inei-data/tree/master/data">get-inei-data/tree/master/data)

title: Adaptatón - Trujillo
body: A web application that allows the neighbors to report flooded streets, which are verified and validated by municipal managers, once the data was validated the application provides alternate routes for circulation, avoiding the flooded streets.

title: Changeset Viewer plugin
body: Changeset Viewer plugin allows you to visualize one or many changesets in JOSM!

title: Tasking import for Peru schools
body: Website to handle the school import process by the Peru-osm community.

title: CLI Tool to process Peru school data
body: CLI tool to split 100 thousand points into blocks according to the school density. The data come from [SIGMED](http://sigmed.minedu.gob.pe/mapaeducativo)

title: osmlint-osmium
body: Osmlint-osmium is a set scrpits to Validate OpenStreetMap data with PBF files. osmlint-osmium is using node-osmium to read the OSM data, dont forget install the dependencies.

title: Mapa de inundaciones del Perú
body: A web application that allows reporting of flooded streets in Peru. Application adapted to face the Niño costero [Phenomenon crisis in 2017 in Peru.](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ni%C3%B1o_costero_(2016-2017))

title: Tofix Backend
body: Backed infrastructure to support [to-fix](https://github.com/osmlab/to-fix) micro tasking tool.

title: Turn Lanes plugin for JOSM
body: TurnLanes-tagging Editor plugin provides an alternative way to add [turn:lanes](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:turn) tags on highways in OpenStreetMap

title: OSM Object Info Plugin
body: Plugin for JOSM to display the OpenstreetMap object information in easy way and get all information according the user and id changeset also It provides links to open on the web the user, id of object and id of changeset.

title: geojson2osm
body: Node CLI tool to convert geojson files into osm files, Helpful to import data into OpenStreetMap.

title: osmlint
body:
OSMLint is a selection of validators built with [TileReduce](https://github.com/mapbox/tile-reduce)  for validating OSM QA Tiles.
A tool to detect issues on the map and validate OpenStreetMap data with [OSM QA Tiles](http://osmlab.github.io/osm-qa-tiles/)

title: Tofix plugin for JOSM
body:
To-Fix OpenStreetMap microtasking challenges available directly from within the JOSM editor.
Instead of picking new tasks and confirming accomplished tasks through the web interface of To-Fix on [https://github.com/osmlab/to-fix](https://github.com/osmlab/to-fix) this plugin allows you to work with To-Fix tasks without ever having to switch out of.
